div.p: This industry module is designed to manage a company that rents Billboards.
Those latter regroup technical details, as well as both costs and revenues.
A map view has also been added to show the zone coverage.

h1.em: How the Billboard Company works with Odoo.

template.p: Every new deal starts in the CRM. This is where all their new requests are centralized.

â€‹The company handles two kinds of leads.
â€‹First, they get requests from customers that want a specific billboard_rental, for example because they saw it in the â€‹streets. For those a lead is created manually, directly in the CRM, while the prospect is on the phone.
â€‹But others are looking for guidance. In that case, they book a meeting here

â€‹From there, an Opportunity is created in the the CRM and a salesperson is assigned to that request.
â€‹After some preliminary discussions, the lead will move to the Territory Research stage, where the salesperson â€‹will perform some analysis to see which of the available billboard_rental is best for their campaign
â€‹Further down the process a Quotation is created. This is where the available Billboard will be selected.
â€‹To quickly encode the orders, salespersons use Quotation Templates, that already contain the basic packages.
â€‹It is also at this point that one needs to decide which kind of subscription to use (short or long term).
template.blockquote: PRO TIP: Quotations templates are great to regroup different options of a specific package, to retrieve them all with just a click.
template.p: When the order is confirmed, multiple things happen.
First, the Quotation is turned into a Sales Order.
Second, a Subscription starts running. Generating revenues that will be impact the margin analysis of the selected Billboard.
Third, a "Installation" task is created into the relevant Project. There, the back-end team will handle the request, prepare the poster and someone will assign it.
Second, a task is created in the relevant project, this allows the staff to get assigned, do the work and then timehseet, so that customers can be billed
During the installation, a dedicated Worksheet has been prepared, to make sure that workers also perform a basic maintenance of the Billboard.
template.blockquote: PRO TIP: An Automated Action updates the task so that its cost is attached to be Billboard P&L
template.p: As always in Odoo, all of those can be retrieved from the stat buttons, at the top of the screen.
The company receives 2 types of Bills.
They are created from the Accounting > Vendor > Bills.
template.blockquote: Pro Tip: Use the OCR scan and let Odoo handle the encoding for you!
template.p: To keep an accurate margin analysis, they need to be attached to the right billboard_rental(s).

For example, a land lease of a specific billboard_rental needs to impact the cost of a specific billboard_rental. While an electricity bill of multiple installations needs to be spread among different accounts.
template.blockquote: Pro Tip: Use the Analytic Distribution Models to prepare this distribution in advance and use it with click.
template.p: Once all this is done, we can finally have a look at the final result.
A new Billboards menu item has been added on the dashboard, it leads straight to Dashboard.
There, one can see the Balance of each Billboard. Does it bring money, or are we losing some?
Moreover, one can also browse those in a Map View, allowing to locate each Billboard or to look for some in a specific area.
All in all, the Billboard form then regroups everything that is needed to get a clear overview
